remarks: Subspace intersection is preserved by the map defined by ~ df-mapd . Part of property (e) in [Baer] p. 40.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2015.)
statement:
mapdin.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdin.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdin.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdin.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdin.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdin.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
mapdin.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
mapdin $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( X i^i Y ) ) = ( ( M ` X ) i^i ( M ` Y ) ) ) $.
